title: LS | Voting & Passing | The Waqf (Amendment) Bill, 2025 & The Mussalman Wakf (Repeal) Bill, 2024
description:
#budget2025 #budgetsession2025 #unionbudget2025 

Lok Sabha passes The Waqf (Amendment) Bill, 2025 and The Mussalman Wakf (Repeal) Bill, 2024.  That the Bill amendss the Waqf Act, 1995 and the Bill repeals the Mussalman Wakf Act, 1923,

Sansad Television is the Parliamentary channel of India. It was created in 2021 by merging Lok Sabha Television and Rajya Sabha Television.
